title: Speak of the devil
body: Brian e-mailed me. It looks like we're going to need an additional guarantor to secure the financing. Not to worry, this is more of a "term negotiation" than anything else, so that's definitely a good thing. I'm going to call Brian when I get home to find out more details. More to come...
author: Dan

comments.author: Newell
comments.body: You're getting finances from the devil? You aren't selling your soul or anything, are you?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: If only it were that simple.
